Subject: Re: Condor
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Sinnertwin had followed the mech fluid for a while now, smelling the fresh
wound in the robot. His instincts where alive, with the chance of
Destruction. As he emerged from the foiliage he saw the cave, where the oil
led. "Grrrrr, Autobot in there" yelled one of the heads, "Yesss, and meat
is fresh. Goood, me like it when he strugle". After the one head finished,
it snapped at the other. It then moved in on the cave, closing the distance
between him and the cave. He transformed and held out his grenade launcher.
"Autobot come out, and we kill him painlessly. If he does not, we have lots
of fun" he yelled at Condor.
